name: Arid Survivor
description:
Survival hunting game where you need to find and hunt down delicious in order to survive. You have a time limit and a limited number of weapons to find and kill the nearby animals. As time goes on your food requirement increases making it harder to stay alive. See how long you can last!

Made for Ludum Dare 36 Jam by Beefsports. Theme was Ancient Technology.

Programming and game design done by me, sprites, textures and music taken from elsewhere.

Attributions:

Grass texture taken from:

http://opengameart.org/content/grass-texture

Music taken from:

http://www.davidvitas.com/portfolio/2016/5/12/rpg-music-pack
